full_text: Knitted jacket in DROPS Air. The piece is worked top down, with raglan and double bands. Sizes S - XXXL. DROPS Design: Pattern ai-404; Yarn group C or A + A SIZES : S - M - L - XL - XXL - XXXL MATERIALS : DROPS AIR from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group C) 250-300-300-350-400-400 g colour 10, fog DROPS BUTTONS NO 630: 6-6-6-6-7-7 items NEEDLES : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 5.5 MM: Length 80 cm. DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 5 MM: Length 80 cm. DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 4 MM: Length 80 cm DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 5.5 MM. DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 4 MM. The technique MAGIC LOOP can be used – you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size. KNITTING TENSION : 16 stitches in width and 20 rows in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm.
name: Ravelry: 236-33 Foggy Autumn Cardigan pattern by DROPS design
